title: I haven't received my crab icon yet from gifting friends
body: I sent my friends many gifts after i saw you get the crab icon with the cocoa after sending a gift. I usually get the icons and stuff sent by riot the next day or sometime soon. But it has been over a week and i still haven't received my icon. I'm beginning to wonder if I will ever receive it. Wondering if anyone else has the same problem. I hope you get back to me soon.

replies.body: Snowdown icons that are not unlocked through the store will need to be distributed to eligible players.  We're aiming to finish distributing them by January 23rd.  Hang tight until then!
Most likely will never get the icon. Riot lul
Same thing happened to me I hope I get the icon soon I gifted my buddy hecarim and elder-wood skin for the holidays for his smurf.  Are we supposed to get the icon after the event?
